name: My Little Ghoul
description:
My Little Ghoul is a game created within 48 hours during Spring Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Orange Expansions" and "Ghoul Reassembly". We focused on the later theme and created a simple tamagotchi style game.

Gameplay

  • Click buttons to spawn toys or food.
  • Drag objects with left mouse button.
  • Destroy objects by right clicking on them. Use to remove poop!
  • Since Ghouls can not die there is no consequence if any meter drop to 0. You have however a very miserable Ghoul if that happens.
  • There is no goal in the game, just make your pet happy.

Credits

Created by Jesper and Sara during Spring Game Jam 2020.
